img_summary: The image depicts the Longevity Decoction, a rare consumable item from the game "Black Myth: Wukong." This item, upon use, significantly increases the player's maximum health for an extended period. It can be obtained by purchasing the formula from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar after completing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge, or bought from the Shrine Store in The New West. The Longevity Decoction is not craftable.
